solution_line_template: First find the total distance the bushes need to cover: {side_length} feet/side * {num_sides} sides = <<{side_length}*{num_sides}={total_distance}>>{total_distance} feet

Then divide the total distance to fill by the distance each bush fills to find the number of bushes Alice needs to buy: {total_distance} feet / {bush_fill_distance} feet/bush = <<{total_distance}/{bush_fill_distance}={num_bushes}>>{num_bushes} bushes
